title: Publisher Correction: Metal–support frontier orbital interactions in single-atom catalysis
author: Xianxian Shi
excerpt: Nature - Publisher Correction: Metal–support frontier orbital interactions in single-atom catalysis
text: Publisher Correction Published: 04 June 2025 Zhilin Wen2 na1, Qingqing Gu4 na1, Long Jiao1,2, Hai-Long Jiang  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0002-2975-79771,2, Haifeng Lv1, Hengwei Wang  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0003-1747-47661, Jiani Ding1,2, Mason P. Lyons5, Alvin Chang6, Zhenxing Feng  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0001-7598-50765, Si Chen2, Yue Lin  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0001-5333-511X1, Xiaoyan Xu4, Pengfei Du4, Wenlong Xu2, Mei Sun1, Yin Li2, Bing Yang  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0003-3515-06424, Tao Zhang  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0001-9470-72154, Xiaojun Wu  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0003-3606-12111,2,7 & …Junling Lu  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0002-2607-68691,2,8  Nature (2025)Cite this article Subjects Correction to: Nature https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-025-08747-z Published online 2 April 2025In the version of the article initially published, in the Fig. 1 caption, the text “Scale bars, 5 nm (c,d); 2 nm (e)” should have read “Scale bars, 2 nm (c,e), 5 nm (d)”. The x axis of Fig. 4a originally read “30, 30, 80, 104, 114, Slab” and has now been corrected to “30, 52, 80,104, 114 and slab”. In the reaction step (vi) in Fig. 4e, “C2H2*” has been corrected to “C2H4*”. These corrections have been made to the HTML and PDF versions of the article. Nature (2025)Cite this article

Subjects

Correction to: Nature https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-025-08747-z Published online 2 April 2025

In the version of the article initially published, in the Fig. 1 caption, the text “Scale bars, 5 nm (c,d); 2 nm (e)” should have read “Scale bars, 2 nm (c,e), 5 nm (d)”. The x axis of Fig. 4a originally read “30, 30, 80, 104, 114, Slab” and has now been corrected to “30, 52, 80,104, 114 and slab”. In the reaction step (vi) in Fig. 4e, “C2H2*” has been corrected to “C2H4*”. These corrections have been made to the HTML and PDF versions of the article.
